trash.title: Trash
trash.auto-delete: Messages that have been in Trash more than 30 days will be automatically deleted.

drafts.title: Drafts
drafts.no-content-w1: Any time you start writing a new Email,
drafts.no-content-w2: Mail3 will automatically save it as a draft along the way.
drafts.no-content-w3: Come here to find all your works in progress.
